data.text: My God, my God, why have you abandoned/deserted me?
My God, every day I call to you during the daytime and during the night,
But you are holy.
Our ancestors trusted in you.
When they cried out to you, you saved them.
But you have not rescued me
Everyone who sees me [HYP] makes fun of me.
“He trusts in Yahweh,
Why do you not protect me now as you did when I was born?
It was as though you adopted me right when I was born.
So, ◄do not stay far from/stay close to► [LIT] me now
My enemies surround me like a herd/group of wild bulls.
They are like roaring lions that are attacking the animals that they want to kill [MET] and eat;
I am completely exhausted [MET],
My strength is all dried up [MET]
My enemies [MET] surround me like a pack/group of wild dogs.
I am so weak and thin that my bones can be seen and counted.
They looked at the clothes that I was wearing
O Yahweh, do not stay far away from me!
Rescue me from those who want to kill me with their swords.
Snatch me away from my enemies who are like lions whose jaws are already open, ready to chew me up
But you have saved me, so  I will declare to my fellow Israelis how great you [MTY] are.
You people who have an awesome respect for Yahweh, praise him!
He does not despise or ignore those who are suffering;
Yahweh, in the great gathering of your people, I will praise you for what you have done.
The poor people whom I have invited to the meal will eat as much as they want.
I pray that people in all nations, even in the remote areas, will think about Yahweh and turn to him,
Because Yahweh is the king!
I desire that all the rich people on the earth will bow before him.
People ◄in the future generations/who have not been born yet► will also serve Yahweh.
People who are not yet born, who will live in future years, will be told how Yahweh rescued his people.
